name: Wondering
content: Wondering by your picture
Wondering if our love can ever be
More than just a dream
Hoping alone tonight just
Hoping somehow you will really feel
The love I have for you.. is real
And life will not be on our side
Still we can have our world
That's all our very own
I beg you don't give into fear
Please take this fateful chance
Let me feel your heart beat near
And we can overcome
This space between our worlds
If we don't give into our fears
I'll take this fateful chance
And build a new world of romance
Share with you the love inside
Wiht nothing left to fean... Tonight...
Love me
